title: Elizabeth Sobinoff looks unrecognisable with a VERY dark fake tan
text:
Married At First Sight's Elizabeth Sobinoff has overhauled her entire look in recent months, and shed an impressive 10kg in the process.

And the jewellery store manager continued her dramatic transformation in her latest selfie shared to Instagram on Friday.

The 27-year-old drew attention to a very dark fake tan as she posed inside a home.

Is that you, Elizabeth? MAFS' Sobinoff, 27, continued her dramatic transformation with a VERY dark fake fan in an Instagram photo on Friday, after shedding an impressive 10kg

In an apparent reference to critics of her transformation, Elizabeth wrote in the caption: 'I may not be everybody's cup of tea but I'm cool with that.'

She added: 'You know me, I love my positivity, so spreading the good feels to everybody out there today.'

In the photo, Elizabeth revealed her trim figure in a black plunging ensemble, and accessorised with silver round-rimmed sunglasses.

Tresses: Alongside her weight loss, the jewellery store manager has ditched her blonde hair extensions, embracing a more natural brunette shade

Since appearing on Married At First Sight earlier this year, Elizabeth has completely transformed her appearance.

She has ditched her blonde hair extensions, embracing a more natural brunette shade, and also toned down her makeup.

Speaking about her 10kg weight loss to NW magazine recently, Elizabeth said she loved her body 'at any size'.

Transformation: Since appearing on Married At First Sight earlier this year (left, on her wedding day), Elizabeth has completely transformed her appearance

'I want women to realise we're all so much more than a number on a scale,' she said.

'So, yes, I've lost some weight since I was a "huge" size 10 when I was on MAFS, but that doesn't mean I'm any "better" now, just because I'm slimmer.'

Elizabeth was paired with Sam Ball on MAFS. On their wedding day, the tradesman infamously 'fat shamed' his bride by saying he didn't 'usually date girls her size'.
description: Married At First Sight's Elizabeth Sobinoff showed off a very dark tan in her latest photo shared to Instagram.
authors: Joe Scek For Daily Mail Australia
